# Sqrt
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Excel SQRT(number): Returns the positive square root of the given number. The value of the number must be positive.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `SQRT`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
